name: Kuopio Region Chamber of Commerce
goal: The Kuopio Region Chamber of Commerce promotes and defends the interests of the business community in Kuopio region.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Customs, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Energy, International co-operation and development, Regional Policy, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: We follow intiatives, policies and legislative files related eg to trade, transportation, logistics, R&D, education and, regional policy
